title: Apricot Christmas cake
ingredients: ['125g dried apricots', '250ml water', '4 eggs, separated', '175g butter', '200g caster sugar', '150g sultanas', '450g glace cherries', '6 candied pineapple slices', '450g dried mixed fruit', '250g plain flour, divided', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '125ml apricot juice', '125g chopped walnuts']
